title: Live Updates: Autopsy Shows Hamas Leader, Yahya Sinwar, Was Killed by a Gunshot to the Head
content: Mr. Sinwar had also been hit in the arm during a firefight earlier with Israeli soldiers, according to the Israeli doctor who oversaw the autopsy. Hamas confirmed its leader’s death but said his “banner will not fall.” The Biden administration was trying to restart cease-fire talks.
summary: Mr. Sinwar had also been hit in the arm during a firefight earlier with Israeli soldiers, according to the Israeli doctor who oversaw the autopsy. Hamas confirmed its leader’s death but said his “banner will not fall.” The Biden administration was trying to restart cease-fire talks.

title: Yahya Sinwar’s Death Could Shake But Not Topple Hamas, Experts Say

summary: Analysts call the killing of several Hamas leaders, including Yahya Sinwar, a deep blow to the Palestinian militant group, but expect it to keep fighting.

title: The Gisele Pelicot Rape Trial Hits Painfully Close to Home in This French Town
content: The town of Mazan, where Gisèle Pelicot was drugged and raped by her husband and strangers, has been shaken by the revelations. “It feels a bit like it’s in our family,” one resident said.
summary: The town of Mazan, where Gisèle Pelicot was drugged and raped by her husband and strangers, has been shaken by the revelations. “It feels a bit like it’s in our family,” one resident said.

title: Ukraine Draft Officers Detain Men After Concert Amid Ongoing Russia War
